mn146:2.4: dhammiṃ kathan”ti → dhammikathanti (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn146:3.5: Sabbeheva, bhante, kato → nandakassa bhante (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn146:10.10: cha khome bāhirā āyatanā aniccā → aniccā vipariṇāmadhammā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn146:27.5: sā → sā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); sā (cck); tā bhikkhuniyo (mr)
